EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-08-28-VMworld 2016.EMAIL-VMworld Booth Promo
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic at VMworld | Win an Oculus Rift, Nvidia Shield & More
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See Turbonomic at VMworld 2016 Meet One on One with Our Executives Meet with members of our executive team at VMworld and learn how our autonomic performance platform controls vital data center and cloud functions autonomically - freeing IT to do the extraordinary. Visit Booth #1139 for Inspired Presentations Hear from more than 25 of our customers and alliance partners as they cover everything from the move to the public cloud, to tackling containers and OpenStack. View full schedule here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/message/6551?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=desired-swag-2016&utm_content=08262016]]>. The Best Swag In Vegas, Guaranteed. This year at VMworld we will be giving away some of the greatest swag you have ever seen: One Oculus Rift every single day, plus the opportunity to earn an Oculus Rift, Nvidia Shield, Amazon Tap, Star Wars BB-8, Raspberry Pi 3 Kit and more, simply by joining The Green Circle Community <[[http://signup.greencirclecommunity.com?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=desired-swag-2016&utm_content=08262016]]>.
Throughout VMworld, complete Online <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3267?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=desired-swag-2016&utm_content=08262016]]> and Live <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/message/6551?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=desired-swag-2016&utm_content=08262016]]> missions such as viewing a presentation at our booth, or participating in a demo. You will earn points for each mission you complete, points you can then redeem for the prizes you see here <[[http://signup.greencirclecommunity.com?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=desired-swag-2016&utm_content=08262016]]>.
No luck of the draw. No gimmicks. Just earn points and spend them like cash.
But why wait until next week, log in <[[http://signup.greencirclecommunity.com?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=desired-swag-2016&utm_content=08262016]]> to the Green Circle Community and start earning points towards your swag today!
